name: Occupancy
query:
select status "Status::80", name "Reservation:Link/Hotel Room Reservation:100", item "Room Type::125", guest_name "Guest::190", from_date "From:Date:90", to_date "To:Date:90", net_total "Net:Float:90",  room "Room::60", room_status "Rm Status::90"
from `tabHotel Room Reservation`
where 
1 = case 
when %(report)s = 'In House' 
and room_status='Checked In' then 1
when %(report)s = 'UnBilled' 
and status <> 'Booked' and sales_invoice is null then 1
when %(report)s = 'UnPaid' 
and sales_invoice is not null and 
exists (select 1 from `tabSales Invoice` x where x.name=sales_invoice and x.status <> 'Paid') then 1
when %(report)s = 'Arrival' 
and status in ('Booked','Advance Paid') and from_date = %(today)s then 1 
when %(report)s = 'Departure' 
and room_status = 'Checked In' and to_date = %(today)s then 1
when %(report)s = 'Reserved' 
and room_status = 'Booked' and from_date >= %(from_date)s and to_date <= %(to_date)s then 1
when %(report)s = 'Completed' 
and status not in ('Booked','In House') and from_date >= %(from_date)s and to_date <= %(to_date)s then 1
else 0 end 
order by from_date, to_date, guest_name
